resources.string: 안드로이드 순정 설정으로 초기화 할까요 아니면 KangDroid설정으로 초기화할까요?
네비게이션 바를 활성화하고 하드웨어 키를 비활성화 합니다
기기가 세로로 있을때 네비게이션 바의 높이를 수정합니다
기기가 회전(가로) 되있을때 네비게이션 바의 높이를 수정합니다
이 기능을 사용함으로써 어플리케이션 데이타가 사라질수 있습니다. 조심있게 사용하세요.
이 기기에 대한 추가 정보를 보여줍니다(CPU, 화면 크기, 등등)
Maximum entries size has been reached
It is not possible to delete last entry
Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app.
The chosen action cannot be added twice
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the reset option.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
길게 누를시, 커스텀 잠금화면 바로가기를 엽니다
Could not load %s. Make sure you have storage available.
Adjust the width of the trigger area
Adjust the vertical postion of the trigger area
Adjust the height of the trigger area
Circle Bar을 화면 맨 오른쪽을 터치한 후에 표시합니다
Adjust the width of the trigger area
Adjust the vertical postion of the trigger area
Adjust the height of the trigger area
네트워크 활동이 없을경우 트래픽 모니터를 숨깁니다.
정말 네트워크 트레픽 색깔을 초기화(기본)으로 번경시킬까요?
OminSwitch를 정확히 켰는지 확인해주세요. 이걸 \"설정\" 에서 설정할수 있습니다
네비게이션 바 공간을 연속 두번 터치하면 기기가 잠깁니다
Top pie does not show status and clock information
상단바와 네비게이션바의 충돌을 방지하기 위해, 파이 트리거는 두가지 모두 활성화 되있을경우 자동으로 비활성화 됩니다.
Mirror right pie on the horizontal axis
Shows snap points to change the trigger edge dynamically
Shows phone status, time and date information
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
Reduces left and right trigger size if keyboard is active
Reduces left and right trigger size if keyboard is active
How and when do you want the menu buttons to appear?
화면 잠금 후에 상단바에 사용자가 설정한 상단바 마중인사가 나옵니다
Ability to apply color alpha value and make notification shade transparent.
Please enter a new label. Leave blank to revert to stock label.
Coose an icon for displaying the weather condition
Enable to colorize all icons, disable to colorize only the monochrome icons
Reset values to\nAndroid- or KangDroid default?
카메라 셔터음을 제거하는경우, 어떤 주/시에서는 불법으로 간주합니다! 조심하게 사용하세요!
Don\'t show heads up in these applications
Don\'t show heads up from these applications
To allow applications to display interactive notifications in a pop-up window on your screen, enable Heads up.
Notification will show until it is dismissed
Hide notification on touch outside and on home button press
Do not hide notification after touch outside or on home button press
Hide before %d seconds. Auto hide on touch outside
Show a bar with the device\'s available memory
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Show notification when storage media is removed
Display ongoing notification for mounted storage
처음 헤드폰을 꽂았을떄 소리가 너무 커지는것을 방지합니다.
너무 높은 볼륨으로 들을경우 난청 등 듣는거에 문제가 될수 있습니다
Allow to overwrite default value with user config
Adjusts the brightness of the screen to take into account the ambient light of your surroundings
배터리 경고 색깔을 기본으로 초기화 시킬까요?
상단바 시계와 날짜 스타일을 설정합니다. (색깔, 위치, 다른것들...)
Show in battery statistics unaccounted and over-counted usage.
Battery icon will show up where the clear all button shows up
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion.
Add, remove, and position items in the appbar
Position the Appbar on the left or right side of the screen
Display a visible tab on the side which will display the appbar when touched.
Display the tab on the top, middle, or bottom on the side of the screen.
Change the size of the visible tab.
Adjust the width of the trigger area
Adjust the vertical postion of the trigger area
Adjust the height of the trigger area
Force expanded notifications on all apps that support it
Will give your sms notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Will give your missed call notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Will give your voicemail notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Automatic light condition change mode is enabled. Manual switching is not possible.
Disable quick settings on secure lock screen.
무조건 제스쳐를 그려야 화면을 잠금해재 할수 있습니다.
Enable/Disable action for the task manager button in the expanded statusbar area.
Customize heads up text and background color
Power menu in expanded status bar
Swiping up on the heads up notification will snooze it for %d minutes
Double tap anywhere on the lockscreen to put the device to sleep
Recent apps panel size in percent
Don\'t exclude the topmost task in recents view
Show recent apps panel on the left edge
